いきなり生徒会長からの呼び出しか……\nいったい何の用事だ？:
A sudden summons from the student council president...
What the hell do you want?
すみません、急に呼び出してしまって。: Sorry for calling you out so suddenly.
どうしたんだ？ なんか慌ててるみたいだが……: What's wrong? You seem kind of flustered...
時間がないため詳しくは説明できません。\n端的にいえば、メイズにて大規模異常が観:
We don't have much time, so we can't explain in detail.
To put it bluntly, a large-scale abnormality has been observed in the Mays.
取り急ぎ、貴方には異常発生場所付近の想定座標をお送りします。\n緊急対応として、:
As soon as possible, I'll send you the coordinates you expected to find near the abnormal location.
As an emergency response, please head to the site immediately for confirmation.
では、私は私で対応がありますので、これで失礼いたします。: Well then, I'll deal with it myself, so if you'll excuse me.
ピコピコピーン！ それについては、ボクが前に集めた\n情報ストックの中に、これか:
*squeeze* *squieze!* That's what I gathered before.
Looks like there's something like this in the information stock!
いやぁ、前に暇すぎて１日をだらだらとネットサーフィンで\n潰したかいがありました:
Well, I had so much free time before that I spent the day lazily surfing the net.
It was worth crushing!
おお、でかした！\nなんか言ってることが、ニートのそれっぽいが！:
Wow, that was huge!
What you're saying sounds like something a NEET would say!
一言多くありません！？\nと、とりあえず、今要約して共有しますね！:
Aren't there too many words!?
A-Anyway, I'll summarize it now!
えーっと、えっと……現在詳しい事はまだ判明していませんが、\nメイズでは時折想定:
Let's see, umm... We don't know the details yet, but...
Occasionally, unexpected phenomena occur in the Mays.
その中のひとつが、『異世界からやってきた』とされる人物の存在。\n極稀に発見・保:
One of them was the existence of a person said to have come from another world.
On rare occasions, there are reports of discovery and protection.
まあ、大半はメイズシンドロームによる\n混乱や妄想の類というオチなんですけど……:
Well, most of it depends on the maise syndrome.
It's just confusion and fantasies...
それで……あれ？ なんだっけ？: So... Huh? What was it again?
だ、大丈夫ですよ！ ボクの超スーパー処理能力が、\r\n失われし情報を見事抽出し:
I-I'll be fine! My super-super-processing ability,
I will extract the lost information splendidly!
それで……中にはザルトゥームにはない知識を有していたり、\n身体検査の数値が異常:
So...some of them had knowledge that Zarthum didn't have.
I heard that the body counts were showing abnormal values!
このことからメイズは時折異なる世界と繋がるのでは\r\nという説も一部では提唱さ:
Because of this, Mayse sometimes finds herself connected to different worlds.
That's what some people have proposed.
ええい！ 長い、３行！ いや、１行！: Yay! Long, three lines! No, one line!
なんかヤバい事が起きてるってことです！\r: That means something bad is happening!
了解した！\nさっそく指定の座標に向かうぞ！:
Understood!
Let's head to the designated coordinates right away!
せっかくのボクの出番が、すごく雑に片付けられた……: It's my turn, and it's been really messed up...
